text: Started my journey with a python course on codecademy, this tought me a lot about programming foundations
I wanted to move into the field of web development and started my first year at Noroff School of Technology focusing on Front end development
After getting comfortable with HTML/CSS & JS i landed a job as a mentor at Noroff, the same school I was attending. While doing this I learned React on the side.
Still working as a mentor while I am at my last year of school. Im feeling confident in React and my abilities to provide value to future employers
